description: This file provides utility functions for splitting a string into tokens based on spaces and storing valid tokens in a linked list.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A singleton object that offers a method to split strings into tokens and store them in a linked list.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the input string into tokens separated by spaces, filters out empty tokens, and returns a linked list of the tokens.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds the token to the list if it is valid (not empty).

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks whether a token is valid (not empty).
